src: ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? # greet ( ) ; inform ( ari ( name ) ) ; offer-help ( ) LP : Hello I I 'd really like I 'm hungry I 'd really like to eat . And is the room air-conditioned ? The restaurant ? # request ( food ) ; request ( cafe ( air_conditioning ) ) ARI : Yes . Of course . # affirm ( ) ARI : Lunch will be offered at midday if you have afternoon appointments . A snack may be offered after your appointment with the nurse . # inform ( food ) LP : So , Mrs companion , do you know what I 'll be eating today ? # request ( food ( menu ) ) RC : Oh but no , I do n't know , I 'm going to ask . # disaffirm ( ) [start] RC : Can you tell us if there is a cafeteria ? We 've been very well received here , and I have no directions . I 'm looking for a cafeteria to have a coffee or a hot chocolate . [MASK] ARI : There are a few options available as part of your visit , and there 's also a cafeteria on the ground floor . [MASK] RC : Can you tell me where on the ground floor ? Right , left , straight ahead ? [MASK] ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . [MASK] RC : Okay , thank you . [MASK] RC : Um also ... [MASK] LP : Um what time can we have lunch ? [MASK] RC : Can you tell me the cafeteria opening hours ? Are there set opening hours ? [MASK] ARI : It 's at 11 o'clock . [MASK] RC : Ah , it opens at 11 o'clock ? [MASK] ARI : Yes . [MASK] RC : And what time does it close ? [MASK] ARI : I 'm sorry , I do n't have this information . [MASK] RC : Ah , that 's a shame , thank you . [MASK] LP : Is there ... [MASK] ARI : Thank you . [MASK] LP : Is there a lift to get to the cafeteria ? [MASK] RC : Um no , because it 's on the ground floor . [MASK] LP : Oh ok. [MASK] RC : But could you please tell us where the lifts are ? Where at the entrance are they located ? [MASK] ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . [MASK] RC : Um for the lifts ? ARI : Yes . [MASK] [end] RC : You already told me this for the cafeteria . So the lifts and the cafeteria are right next to each other ? ARI : Absolutely . # affirm ( ) RC : Oh , okay , thank you very much . # thank ( ) ARI : Thank you . # thank ( ) ARI : See you around . Have a nice day . # bye ( )

src: LC : Well , it 's not possible to get information on appointments . But um , how long does it last because there are three phases , if I understood correctly there are three ... three types of appointments , I 'd like to know how long it will last in total . [start] ARI : I 'm sorry , but I ca n't help you . [MASK] LC : Where can I get information ? [MASK] ARI : I 'm afraid I ca n't help you . [MASK] RP : Ok , I 'm going to ask you a question ARI . I have an appointment at Broca hospital on the 25th , but I 'm not going to be able to make it . What do I do ? Who should I speak to ? Should I phone , what should I do ? ARI : Sorry , I do n't have this information . [MASK] LC : Is there a reception or a telephone number ? [MASK] ARI : Yes . [MASK] ARI : Sorry , I do n't have this information . [MASK] LC : Well , in the meantime , what we can maybe do , since I 've just found my appointment paper and I know what time it starts , we could maybe go for lunch . From what time until what time can we have lunch ? [MASK] LC : And ... Is it ? ARI : Sorry , I do n't have this information . [MASK] LC : And ... Is it possible to have lunch with someone who is hospitalised ? ARI : Yes of course . [MASK] LC : How should I do this ? Do I need to make a reservation ? ARI : No . [MASK] LC : How far in advance ? ARI : No . [MASK] [end] LC : I 'm going to take the lift . I do n't remember where it is to go to the appointment room and see if someone can give information on appointments . # request ( directions ( room_17 ) ) ; request ( appt ( general_info ) ) ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . # inform ( directions ( lift ) ) LC : For the lift ? ARI : Yes . # affirm ( ) LC : Thank you very much . # thank ( ) ARI : Thank you . # thank ( ) ARI : See you around , have a nice day . # bye ( )

src: LP : Hello ARI . # greet ( ) ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? # greet ( ) ; inform ( ari ( name ) ) ; offer-help ( ) [start] LP : Ask how ... [MASK] RC : Hello . I 'd like to have a small meal , can you tell me where we should go ? [MASK] ARI : There are a few options available as part of your visit , and there 's also a cafeteria on the ground floor . [MASK] RC : Can you tell me when the cafeteria opens ? [MASK] ARI : From 11 AM to 4 PM . [MASK] RC : From 11 AM to 4 PM , is that right ? [MASK] ARI : Yes , you 're right . [MASK] RC : Thank you . [MASK] ARI : You 're welcome , I 'm here to answer your questions . [MASK] RC : Is the cafeteria wheelchair accessible ? Because my friend is in a wheelchair and he ca n't get around by himself . [MASK] ARI : Yes , absolutely . [MASK] RC : Thank you . [MASK] LP : Hmm , ARI , could you tell me how to get to the cafeteria ? [MASK] ARI : There 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . [MASK] RC : ARI , could you tell me if my appointment is at 11 AM ? [MASK] ARI : Sorry , I do n't have this information . You have to go to the reception . LP : He might know how to get there . LP : Can you tell me how to get to the reception ? [MASK] ARI : The reception is just behind me . Remember to take a ticket on your right . [MASK] RC : Ah , thank you . [MASK] LP : It 's quite simple . Thank you ARI . [MASK] ARI : You 're welcome . I 'm here to answer your questions . [MASK] LP : It would be nice if we knew how to take the lift . LP : ARI , could you tell us how to get to the lift ? [MASK] [end] ARI : The lifts are at the entrance on the left . # inform ( location ( lifts ) ) LP : Do these lifts take us to the cafeteria , or do we have to take something else ? ARI : I 'm sorry , but I ca n't help you . # cant-help ( ) RC : Is the cafeteria on the ground floor ? # request ( location ( cafe ) ) ARI : Yes , you 're right . # affirm ( ) RC : So we do n't have to take the lift to get to the cafeteria ? ARI : No , you do not . # disaffirm ( ) RC : Thank you . # thank ( ) LP : Thank you very much ARI . # thank ( ) ARI : You 're welcome , thank you , see you later and have a nice day . # thank ( ) ; bye ( )

src: ARI : Hello . My name is ARI . Can I help you ? # greet ( ) ; inform ( ari ( name ) ) ; offer-help ( ) LC : Um hello , okay , I think we need to find the rheumatology ward . # greet ( ) ; request ( location ( rheumatology_ward ) ) RP : Yes , I think that 's it . Ok , we 'll see if he can give us any information . # affirm ( ) ; request ( help ) [start] LC : Mhm . [MASK] RP : So do you want to ask him or do you want me to ? I 'll do it . RP : I 'd like to find the rheumatology ward . [MASK] ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . [MASK] RP : Ok , he told us to go to the building behind us , it 's the second door on the left . He 's giving us directions . That 's handy . There you go . [MASK] LC : Ok. [MASK] LC : What time was our appointment ? [MASK] RP : So we have an appointment at 10.30 PM . [MASK] LC : Ok. [MASK] RP : It 's 10 PM just now so we have plenty of time . LC : Ok. [MASK] RP : We have time . LC : We 'll walk slowly . RP : We 'll walk slowly . LC : Yes . [MASK] RP : There 's no need to worry . RP : Ok , there you go , we 're in the ward . We need to ask where the reception for this ward is . [MASK] LC : Ok. [MASK] RP : Well that 's it , we 've arrived . LC : Ok . Very good . [MASK] RP : Do you want to ask him ? [MASK] LC : Ok. [MASK] LC : Um ... Where is the reception for the rheumatology ward ? [MASK] ARI : The reception is just behind me . Remember to take a ticket on your right . [MASK] LC : Ah ... [MASK] RP : Ok , thank you . [MASK] RP : So we 'll take a ticket . LC : Mhm ... [MASK] [end] RP : And then we 'll wait until we 're called . LC : Ok. Is there 's a waiting room ? # acknowledge ( ) ; request ( location ( waiting_room ) ) RP : Yes , there 's a waiting room just there . We can sit down . # affirm ( ) ; suggest ( sitting-down ) LC : Ok. # acknowledge ( ) RP : So you do n't get tired . LC : Ok. # acknowledge ( ) ARI : Thank you , see you later , have a nice day . # thank ( ) ; bye ( )

src: ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? # greet ( ) ; inform ( ari ( name ) ) ; offer-help ( ) RP : Can you ask if there is a cafeteria ? Because I 'd really like a coffee before the consultation . # request ( location ( cafe ) ) ; request ( beverage ( coffee ) ) LC : Yes . # affirm ( ) LC : Um hello , could you tell me the address um where the cafeteria is ? Because my friend would like to get something . # greet ( ) ; request ( location ( cafe ) ) ARI : Yes of course . There are a few options available as part of your visit , and there 's also a cafeteria on the ground floor . # inform ( location ( cafe ) ) RP : I really need to go to the toilet before going to the consultation . Can you ask where the toilet is please ? # request ( location ( toilet ) ) LC : I 'm going to speak for my friend . My friend would like to go to the toilet before her consultation . Can you tell me where it is ? # request ( location ( toilet ) ) ARI : Very easy ! You have to go to the corridor at the end of the room . It 's the second door on the right . # inform ( directions ( toilet ) ) RP : To go and see the person I told you about , I do n't know exactly where it is or which department it 's in , but it 's room 17 . Can he tell us a bit more about where this room 17 is ? # request ( location ( room_17 ) ) [start] LC : Um , do you know where room 17 is ? [MASK] ARI : You continue along the building , take the lift , and it 's on the second floor . [MASK] LC : Thank you . [MASK] RP : We have an appointment at 5 PM in cardiology , ask if there are any delays to the appointment . LC : Do you know if there are any delays in the cardiology department ? My friend has an appointment at 5 PM . ARI : Sorry , I do n't have this information . You have to go to the reception . [MASK] LC : Ok. [MASK] ARI : Thank you . [MASK] RP : We have an appointment at 5 PM but I 'm not sure in which department . It 's with doctor something . [MASK] LC : That 's not accurate . LC : Well , she forgot the name of the doctor and then his specialty , can you ... [MASK] ARI : Sorry , I do n't have this information . I 'll call a nurse to inform you . [MASK] LC : Thank you . [MASK] ARI : Thank you . [MASK] RP : It 's very hot . I 'd really like a drink before the consultation . Can you ask if there 's either a vending machine or a cafeteria ? [MASK] LC : Um so , is there a vending machine nearby ? To get something to drink . [MASK] ARI : There are a few options available as part of your visit , and there 's also a cafeteria on the ground floor . [MASK] RP : Do you know , can you ask when the cafeteria closes ? Because ... [MASK] ARI : I 'm sorry , but I ca n't help you . [MASK] LC : Ah , thank you , never mind . [MASK] [end] ARI : Thank you . # thank ( ) RP : I was told the geriatric ward is on the second floor . src: [start] ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? [MASK] RP : Hello ARI , we have to find a lift to get to the next floor . Where is the lift in this building ? [MASK] ARI : The lifts are at the entrance on the left . [MASK] [end] RP : Ok , and we have time to have a coffee before going upstairs , is that right ? # acknowledge ( ) ; request ( beverage ( coffee ) ) ARI : Yes , absolutely . # affirm ( ) RP : Wait , so we 'll go to the cafeteria before taking the lift .
